message: Let's start with a fair split, and we can reassess as we go along.
You were too generous in round 1, now it's my turn to be fair... sort of
I'm willing to compromise and give you a larger share, but I still think I deserve a majority of the funds.
You're not giving me enough, I'm starting to get hungry
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to give in completely to your demands.
You're not even close to being generous, I'm starting to think you're not a good negotiator
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to give in completely to your demands. This is my final offer.
You call that a final offer? I'm not impressed, let's see if you can do better
I'm willing to give you a larger share, but I'm not going to give in completely. This is my last offer.
You're not even trying to be generous, I'm starting to think you're just trolling me at this point
I've had enough of this game. I'm willing to give you the entire amount, but only if you agree to stop being so greedy and unfair.
